# UriExtensions.ParseQuery method

Executes String) using the Query from *uri*.

```csharp
public static NameValueCollection ParseQuery(this Uri uri)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| uri | A Uri. |

## Return Value

A NameValueCollection. Query parameters which were duplicated, e.g., arrays, have values concatenated with commas.
